title: A way to long discussion on AI, its working and 5.1 ChatGPT
subtitle: An intuitive excavation into how large language models actually work.
summary: A reflective exploration of how AI systems function, blending intuitive reasoning, symbolic analogy, and conceptual understanding. The piece reveals the author's early grasp of transformer architecture through curiosity rather than formal training.
tone: Inquisitive, humble, searching, clarifying. Intellectual honesty filtered through spiritual and symbolic intuition — like light fracturing through branches.

motifMap.meaning: Revelation filtered through complexity — the piece’s central gesture.
Branches of conceptual difficulty the author works through.
Detailed examination of model mechanics, even when uncertain.
